name: Invisible Stalker
condition_immunities: fatigue, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The stalker makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. On a critical hit  the target is pushed up to 15 feet and knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Invisibility
special_abilities.desc: The stalker is invisible. Creatures that see invisible creatures see the stalker as a vague humanoid outline.

special_abilities.name: Wind Tracker
special_abilities.desc: If given a quarry by a summoner, the stalker knows the direction and distance to the quarry as long as they are on the same plane of existence and not sealed from each other by a barrier that doesnt allow air to pass.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: An invisible stalker doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.
